points: Looking to upskill in finance and accounting with technology? Enroll in IT Accurate’s SAP FICO course in Nagpur.
Located in the heart of the city, Lokmat Bhawan, Ramdaspeth.
Gain practical exposure to SAP’s Financial Accounting (FI) and Controlling (CO) modules through real-world projects and expert mentorship.
Experience a hands-on approach designed to prepare you for real-time challenges and global certifications.
Suitable for both freshers and working professionals aiming to advance in their careers.
Benefit from 100% placement assistance, ensuring a seamless path from learning to landing a job.
Join one of the best SAP FICO courses in Nagpur and take your career forward.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose IT Accurate for SAP FICO Training in Nagpur
points: At IT Accurate, we don’t just teach SAP – we shape SAP professionals.
As a leading institute for the SAP FICO course in Nagpur, our training is built on deep industry insight and expert-led instruction.
Certified trainers with years of real-time SAP project experience make each class practical and easy to relate to.
Access updated courseware, live assignments, and personalised mentoring for effective learning.
Flexible batches, weekend classes, and online learning support make it easy to learn your way.
Located in the heart of the city, Lokmat Bhawan, Ramdaspeth.
Trusted by hundreds of learners for consistent results, transparent guidance, and strong placement connections with top MNCs and consulting firms.

courseLocation.title: SAP FICO Certification & Project-Based Learning
points: What makes our SAP FICO course in Nagpur stand out is the focus on real-time learning.
We don’t stop at theory – you get hands-on access to SAP servers to practice every module with real project scenarios.
From day one, you’ll work on exercises that simulate actual finance operations in SAP.
On completing the course, you’ll receive a certificate from IT Accurate, validating your skills and boosting your resume.
You’ll also be fully prepared for global SAP certification exams.
Our project-based approach ensures you transition smoothly into the job market with confidence and competence.

FeesDuration.heading: Fees, Duration & Batch Options
FeesDuration.content: The SAP FICO course in Nagpur at IT Accurate offers flexible batch timings, and weekday and weekend options are available. Course duration is 2.5 to 3 months, with extended access to practice sessions. Our fee structure is affordable with EMI and installment options to support learners from all backgrounds. Reach out today for the latest batch schedule and fee details.
